Summary: Object flew over silently being pursued by (2) F-15, they were being foloowed by 2nd object.
divs: sighting detailssaw brightly lit object to south west moving to north east. as it got closer it slowed. object was large, egg shaped and brightly lit. (2) f-15 jets were pursuing the object and all were moving at a slow rate of speed approx. 750 ft above ground. second object came from south west then as it reached about 1 mile it rose slightly, rolled left at 90 deg. then flew out of sight on knife edge. with in 30 seconds after 2nd object flew out of sight a meteor streaked from 11 oclock to 8 oclock due north of my location. first object was larger than a c-5 galaxy and was completely silent. second object was silent except for the sounf of air\wind. this object was the size of an f-111 but shaped total different. the first object was moving in a stuttered motion not completely fluid. whole event took place less than a half mile radius of my location.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Sims
This sighting has never been favorited.
